update T_DIABETES_VISITS
HR_GID = #{hrGid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIAB_ID = #{diabId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOC_ID = #{docId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VIS_DATE = #{visDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NEX_VIS_DATE = #{nexVisDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VIS_DOCTOR = #{visDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RES_DOCTOR = #{resDoctor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

SYMPTOM3 = #{symptom3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYMPTOM4 = #{symptom4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TRA_DAO_SMOKING = #{traDaoSmoking,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
ALC_CONSUMPTION = #{alcConsumption,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TRA_ALC_CON = #{traAlcCon,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
EXE_FREQUENCY = #{exeFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRA_EXE_FREQUENCY = #{traExeFrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

TRA_EXE_DURATION = #{traExeDuration,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
DAO_STA_FOOD = #{daoStaFood,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
TRA_DAO_STA_FOOD = #{traDaoStaFood,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
PSY_ADJ_EVA = #{psyAdjEva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COM_BEH_EVA = #{comBehEva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GLU = #{glu,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
GLY_HEM = #{glyHem,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
EX_DATE = #{exDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAB_EXAM_RES = #{labExamRes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MED_COM = #{medCom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADV_DRUG_REA = #{advDrugRea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADV_DRUG_REA_DES = #{advDrugReaDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LBS_REA = #{lbsRea,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VISITS_EVA = #{visitsEva,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_NAME = #{drugName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_FREQ = #{drugFreq,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_DOSE = #{drugDose,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
DRUG_DOSE_UNIT = #{drugDoseUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_NAME2 = #{drugName2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRUG_FREQ2 = #{drugFreq2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REF_DEPT = #{refDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_ORG = #{regOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

REC_DATE = #{recDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPD_USER = #{updUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPD_DATE = #{updDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DATA_FLAG = #{dataFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FOLLOWUP_NO = #{followupNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ARCHIVE_ID = #{archiveId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where DIAB_GID = #{diabGid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
